t: PAX - VIDEO: Air Transat reveals new brand positioning "Travel Moves Us"
s: As part of its growth strategy, Air Transat has launched a new brand positioning that explores a simple, yet complex question: why travel? “Travel Moves Us" will include TV, outdoor and digital activations in Quebec and Ontario and will later be deployed in international markets.
